import React from 'react' import './post.css' import like from '../../img/like.png' import notlike from '../../img/notlike.png' import comment from '../../img/comment.png' import share from '../../img/share.png' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Post = ({data}) => { const {user} = useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) const [liked,setLiked] = useSta return (
{data.likes} likes
{data.name} {data.desc}
) } export default Post
